Constructor Detail

AbstractGraph

public AbstractGraph()
Default constructor is needed as classes inheriting from this class might be serializable.

AbstractGraph

public AbstractGraph(GraphElementFactory pFactory)
Constructor. Creates a new graph with estimated pVxEstmSize vertices and pEdEstmSize edges. pFactory will be used to create new instances of graph elements.

Parameters:
pFactory - Factory object used to create new instances of graph elements.

addGraph

public SequentialIdMapper addGraph(Graph pGraph)
Description copied from interface: Graph
add a graph to the graph. ids are automatically assigned, a mapping is returned. the graphs must be either both directed or both undirected. no merging of different graph types is supported. the attributes on the graphelements are not duplicated! (the reference to the map is copied.)

Specified by:
addGraph in interface Graph
Parameters:
pGraph - the graph to be added
